title: Resonance Scepter
summaries: The Resonance Scepter is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon which has a 1/8 (12.5%) chance of dropping from the Princess NPC. When used, it creates a glowing pink circular projectile at the cursor's location, which expand and then collapse into sparkles over the course of 1 second. The scepter in the player's hand also sparkles while it is used, emitting pink light. There must be a clear, unobstructed line of sight between the player and the cursor's location for the projectile to be summoned right on cursor, otherwise the projectile will be summmoned upon reaching the first solid block.

<linked>Enemies</linked> within the projectiles will be rapidly damaged and knocked back away from the player. There is no limit on how many times a projectile can strike enemies, but the damage of the projectile will be reduced by 2% after each strike.

statistics.Sell: 10 GC
